reviewtext: We carry when we are outside our pilot cars to talk to the truck driver while helping to park or manuver a oversize load. Some states require us to have a handheld CB so I pick the best. the price on amazon is the best any where.  I would recommend the cobra to any one.
summary: These are a exellent hand held CB, I like the weather channels on it too. Terry Sauers owner Mid-Michigan Pilot Car Group
